title: Dog Park, Lush, Rich Landscaping, Covered Outdoor Gas Grills
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 650 Sq.
From convenience to luxury we have everything you are looking for at Bay Court at Harbour Pointe in Mukilteo, WA.
Conveniently located in the heart of the Harbour Pointe, you will have dining, shopping and entertainment options around every corner.
We offer the best apartment living in Mukilteo, and with one, two and three bedroom options we are sure to have the perfect floor plan to fit your lifestyle.
We'd love to welcome you home, come see the lifestyle we have to offer at Bay Court at Harbor Pointe.

Walk in closets*, Ample storage space, New Espresso Cabinets, Quartz Countertops with Subway Tile Backsplash, Stainless-Steel Kitchen Appliances, Full size washer & dryer, Ceiling fans, Wrapped Mirrors, Private Patio or Balcony*, Porcelain – Tiled Fireplaces, Luxury Fixtures, ALL APARTMENT HOMES INCLUDE:, Vaulted ceilings (top floors), Wood-Grained Plank Flooring, Bay Windows*, Wood-burning fireplace, Two tone paint, NEW UPDATES TO FINISHES INCLUDE:
Covered Outdoor Gas Grills, Dog Park, Maintenance Staff

Available 7 Days per Week, Relaxing Trails throughout the Property, Covered Parking & Private Garages, Lush, Rich Landscaping, 24 Hour Fitness Center, Gazebo with Large Dining Table, Outdoor Fire Pit Seating, Year-Round Hot Tub, Playground, 2 Heated Seasonal Pools, Business center with WIFI, PC's, Printer, and Fax
Breed restrictions apply and max of 2 pets per apartment home.
Want more info on this unit?
We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.
Mukilteo apartments Bay Court at Harbour Pointe
